channel.title: Comments on: Atomic Wallet October Report.

item.title: By: Akash Chaudhary
item.dc:creator: Akash Chaudhary
item.description: Atomic team is so promising and we are hoping best for Atomic wallet in 2020 as well. Let's see how the things are plays out in this year.
item.content:encoded: Atomic team is so promising and we are hoping best for Atomic wallet in 2020 as well. Let’s see how the things are plays out in this year.

item.title: By: Michael Michael
item.dc:creator: Michael Michael
item.description: Atomic continues to take the Crypto community by surprise. New features, new milestones, new resources added to help newbies learn more about crypto and the blockchain. Atomic is king!
item.content:encoded: Atomic continues to take the Crypto community by surprise. New features, new milestones, new resources added to help newbies learn more about crypto and the blockchain. Atomic is king!
